notes: TypeScript: 0 errors across all modified frontend files (middleware.ts, lib/auth.ts, lib/api.ts, layout.tsx, DevModeBanner.tsx, SessionProvider.tsx).
Python: all modified backend files (auth.py, config.py, main.py) compile cleanly. Pydantic field_validator for auth_mode correctly validates sso/dev values.

Zero-mock policy: DEV_USER is a static development bypass user, NOT mock data. It is gated behind an explicit AUTH_MODE=dev environment variable and represents a legitimate dev-mode feature. The user has a consistent sys_id across frontend and backend for proper session/request correlation.
No placeholder code detected. All implementations are complete -- middleware bypass, Credentials provider, auto-sign-in, API token skip, banner display.
DevModeBanner uses role=status and aria-label for screen reader accessibility.
SSO code path is completely unchanged -- no regressions to existing OAuth flow.
Environment variable naming follows existing conventions: CHAT_ prefix for backend, AUTH_MODE/NEXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_MODE for frontend.
Dev user has matching sys_id between frontend (DEV_USER_PROFILE) and backend (DEV_USER) for consistent identity.
